title.rendered: Gemstone MediaWall Recognized as a 2011 Top Product

content.rendered: Professional Builder & Professional Remodeler Magazines annually feature in their July and August 2011 issues respectively, a list of the top “breakthrough” products for the year. Eldorado’s Gemstone™ MediaWall™, has made the coveted list. Hundreds of entries were submitted in 18 different categories. Winners will also be featured online at www.HousingZone.com

excerpt.rendered: Professional Builder & Professional Remodeler Magazines annually feature in their July and August 2011 issues respectively, a list of the top “breakthrough” products for the year.
